text: Barry Goldberg (December 25, 1942 â€“ January 22, 2025) was an American blues and rock keyboardist, songwriter, and record producer. Goldberg helped produce albums for Percy Sledge, Charlie Musselwhite, James Cotton, Bob Dylan and the Textones. Goldberg was the nephew of former Supreme Court Justice Arthur Goldberg. Goldberg died from complications of non-Hodgkin's lymphoma on January 22, 2025, at the age of 83. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1942 births Category:2025 deaths Category:American keyboardists Category:American songwriters Category:American record producers Category:American blues musicians Category:American rock musicians Category:Businesspeople from Chicago Category:Musicians from Chicago
title: Barry Goldberg
